#

If your console is set to Swedish, Norwegian, Dutch, Finnish, Danish, Turkish, or Hungarian, please temporarily swap to a different language if possible to resume playing in the interim.

trello_event_93.label: Game Status
trello_event_93.name: Anti-cheat updates are being deployed
trello_event_93.desc: On Sunday, a few professional Apex Legends player accounts were hacked during an ALGS event. Game and player security are our highest priorities, which is why we paused the competition to address the issue immediately. Our teams have deployed the first of a layered series of updates to protect the Apex Legends player community and create a secure experience for everyone. Thank you for your patience.
